permissions: Allowed when the adjustment has a trucker and the user is an admin or a practical manager for that trucker.
side_effects: Updates a driver day adjustment and may enqueue a background job to refresh the generated expression and amount.
validation_notes: Requires the adjustment ID argument and at least one updatable field. Driver day must be managed. If amount_explicit is not provided, plan_content and driver_day_description must be present. expression_generated must be a valid Dentaku expression when set.

flags.name: --amount-explicit
flags.description: Explicit adjustment amount (can be set to an empty string to clear, if supported by the API).
